'''The Hunter Becomes the Hunted''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to get any party member knocked out by [[The Great Snowboar King]].

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is a reference to the defeat voice-over of the [[Treasure Hoarders: Marksman]].
